Home.Paragraph: This is a prototype for a PWA that allows for viewing cloud content and storing it for offline use. This prototype is primarily intended to be a learning/research project for learning about the capabilities and limitiations of PWAs especially regarding offline capabilities on a variety of devices

About.Paragraph1: This prototype was created for Tech Matters as part of 1000 Landscapes for 1 Billion People.
About.Paragraph2: The source code is available on GitHub.
